input_files.name: knownsites
input_files.description: List of files containing known polymorphic sites used [...]
input_files.help: List of files containing known polymorphic sites used to exclude regions around known polymorphisms from analysis

input_files.name: knownsites_indexes
input_files.help: Corresponding indexes for the knownsites. File position in list must match with its corresponding VCF's position in the knownsites file list. For example, if the first file in the knownsites list is 1000G_omni2.5.hg38.vcf.gz then the first item in this list must be 1000G_omni2.5.hg38.vcf.gz.tbi. Optional, but will save time/cost on indexing.
